title: 2  Paintings catalogue Jupyter Notebook
text:
2.1 Paintings catalogue
The below Python code uses SPARQLWrapper to retrieve data from Wikidata based on a SPARQL query.
Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q10901792
Original language title: Midas und Bacchus
English title: Midas and Bacchus
Year: 1624
Creator: Nicolas Poussin
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q11772156
Original language title: Die kleine Obsthändlerin
English title: The Little Fruit Seller
Year: 1670
Creator: Bartolomé Esteban Murillo
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q11821341
Original language title: Die Anbetung der Hirten
English title: Adoration of the Shepherds
Year: 1646
Creator: Rembrandt
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q12899795
Original language title: Der König trinkt
English title: Twelfth Night
Year: 1654
Creator: Gabriel Metsu
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q15691130
Original language title: Der bethlehemitische Kindermord
English title: Massacre of the Innocents

Copyright: public domain

Copyright: public domain
